text:
What incredible news! The @US_FDA has issued the EUA for Pfizer's #COVID19 #vaccine.  

While the vaccines are game-changers in our fight, we must continue our #publichealth efforts while we await their full impact

#WearAMask #WashYourHands #watchyourdistance and #VaccinesWork https://t.co/sgllz3Zvxd
